p: Of the 32 plant families recorded in the pikas’ diet, Asteraceae, Poaceae, Primulaceae, Ranunculaceae, Rosaceae and Scrophulariaceae showed significant differences across sites in the mean proportion of occurrence within diet (Table 1). We found no significant difference in proportion of plant families in the premonsoon (GLM: F 12 = 111.42, p < 0.25) and postmonsoon season (GLM: F 6 = 49.74, p < 0.08).
